txt_content:
艾德利塞，被描绘的世界Adelyssei, the Painted World

 作品介绍 

君主，艺术家，自我封闭领域的囚徒，蒙面皇后独自一人描绘着她的世界。从不畏惧耻辱与失败，她展现着她的心意、梦想与异想天开的想法。这是她的世界，不属于任何人。

从辉煌的水晶窗向外望去，映入眼帘的是她一望无际，五彩缤纷的江山。她的视野无所不及，立于高耸的尖顶之上，镌绣于挂毯之中，铭刻于都城墙中，任何细枝末节都不能逃脱她的视界。梦幻的飞艇也听从她的调遣，出发寻找那无法找到的外来者。

曾几何时，她也在这世界中自由翱翔，但对艺术的执着与这复杂精细的堡垒的魅力征服了她。更深层次的理解带来了人性的磨灭，她的一切逐渐消亡，空留一副面具。就这样，她绘画着，等待着，盼望着她的幻想破灭的一刻，她的领域崩坏的一刻。

Monarch, artist, prisoner of her own closed realm, the masked queen paints her world alone. Without fear of shame or failure, she executes on every intention, dream and whimsical desire. It is her world, and no one else's. 

Peering into brilliant crystal mirrors, she observes the vast, coloured landscapes of her domain. Her eyes ubiquitous, perched atop tall spires, embroidered in tapestries and carved into the very walls of her monopolis, no detail escapes her. On her behalf, fantastical airships seek out impossible visitors from the outside world. 

In a different time, she roamed her world freely, but as her painterly obsession grew, so too did her fascination with the great citadel's singular machinery. Deeper understanding came at the expense of humanity, and bit by bit she perished, until the mask was all that remained. Now she paints, waits, and hopes. Though on a whim her fantasy may end, and with it her domain.
